title: Claim details - whistleblowing claims
p1: You've selected a whistleblowing claim, so you can request that we forward a copy of your claim to a relevant regulator (also known as 'prescribed person') or body.
p2: We will notify the respondent if you choose for us to forward your claim but this will not affect how we process your claim
p3: Not all whistleblowing claims will have an appropriate regulator or body
p4: Find the relevant regulator or body (opens in a new window) for your type of claim from this list
forwardClaim: Do you want us to forward your whistleblowing claim to a relevant regulator or body?
regOrBodyName: Enter the name of the relevant regulator or body. If you cannot find one, enter 'N/A',

whistleblowingEntityName.required: Tell us the name of the relevant regulator or body. If you cannot find one enter as 'N/A'
whistleblowingEntityName.invalidLength: Name entered for regulator or body must be between 3 characters and 100 characters. If you cannot find one enter as 'N/A'
